alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 14 at 1:57PM EDT until May 14 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of south central Michigan, including the following county, Jackson. * WHEN...Until 800 PM EDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 155 PM EDT, Radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain in excess of 2 inches has fallen within the past hour. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Jackson, Brooklyn, Grass Lake, Vandercook Lake, Leoni, Napoleon, Norvell, Michigan Center, Oak Point, Clark Lake, Lake Columbia, Munith, Pleasant Lake, Sunset Beach and Liberty. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
